page.title: 14LEISURE
page.content: Next to the beaches are several shops, where tourists can buy suveniors, the popular swimming pool, and the cafe, where one can buy snacks or meals. Other popular facilities include the mini railwaw, the arcade, the skating rink, and the crazy golf. 600,000 people visit the coliseum each year. 150 people are employed to work in the coliseum in the Winter, and 256 in the Summer. {CARLYON BAY GOLF CLUB { }This club has 1 professional golfer, Nigel Sears, theowner. However famous people have played at the club, one being Tony Jacklin. Edward VIII used toplay here, and when he was Prince Of Wales he donated a cup to the club.
